K10sukhvysu:5: bhikṣuśatair abhijñānābhijñātaiḥ sthavirair mahāśrāvakaiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ /
K10sukhvysu:6: tadyathā sthavireṇa ca śāriputreṇa mahāmaudgalyāyanena ca mahākāśyapena
K10sukhvysu:7: ca mahākapphiṇena ca mahākātyāyanena ca mahākauṣṭhilena
K10sukhvysu:8: ca revatena ca śuddhipaṃthakena ca naṃdena cānaṃdena ca rāhulena ca
K10sukhvysu:9: gavāṃpatinā ca bharadvājena ca kālodayinā ca vakkulena cāniruddhena
K10sukhvysu:10: ca / etaiś cānyaiś ca saṃbahulair mahāśrāvakaiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisattvair
K10sukhvysu:13: bodhisattvena gaṃdhahastinā ca bodhisattvena nityodyuktena ca
K10sukhvysu:18: śakreṇa ca devānām iṃdreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā /
K10sukhvysu:20: tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram āmaṃtrayati sma / asti
K10sukhvysu:21: śāriputra paścime digbhāga ito buddhakṣetraṃ koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhakṣetrāṇām
K10sukhvysu:24: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca
K10sukhvysu:25: deśayati / tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ
K10sukhvysu:27: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau
K10sukhvysu:28: nāsti sattvānāṃ kāyaduḥkhaṃ na cittaduḥkhaṃ apramāṇāny eva sukhakāraṇāni /
K10sukhvysu:29: tena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatīty ucyate //2//
K10sukhvysu:30: punar aparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ saptabhir vedikābhiḥ
K10sukhvysu:31: saptabhis tālapaṃktibhiḥ kiṃkiṇījālaiś ca samalaṃkṛtā samaṃtato 'nuparikṣiptā
K10sukhvysu:37: punar aparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau saptaratnamayyaḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ /
K10sukhvysu:38: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohita-
K10sukhvysu:43: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu samaṃtāc caturdiśaṃ catvāri sopānāni citrāṇi
K10sukhvysu:47: tāsāṃ ca puṣkariṇīnāṃ samaṃtād ratnavṛkṣā jātāś citrā
K10sukhvysu:51: ratnasya / tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu saṃti padmāni jātāni nīlāni
K10sukhvysu:60: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nityapravāditāni divyāni
K10sukhvysu:63: triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣati divyānāṃ
K10sukhvysu:65: tatra ye sattvā upapannās ta ekena purobhaktena
K10sukhvysu:66: koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhānāṃ vaṃdaṃty anyāṃl lokadhātūn gatvā / ekaikaṃ ca
K10sukhvysu:67: tathāgataṃ koṭiśatasahasrābhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhir abhyavakīrya punar api
K10sukhvysu:71: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre saṃti haṃsāḥ kraiṃcā mayūrāś ca /
K10sukhvysu:72: te triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya saṃnipatya saṃgītiṃ kurvaṃti
K10sukhvysu:77: śrutvā buddhamanasikāra utpadyate dharmamanasikāra utpadyate saṃghamanasikāra
K10sukhvysu:78: utpadyate // tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra tiryagyonigatās te
K10sukhvysu:82: tatra buddhakṣetre nirayāṇāṃ nāsti tiryagyonīnāṃ yamalokasya
K10sukhvysu:83: nāsti / te punaḥ pakṣisaṃghās tenāmitāyuṣā tathāgatena nirmitā
K10sukhvysu:87: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre tāsāṃ ca tālapaṃktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca
K10sukhvysu:88: kiṃkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgur manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati /
K10sukhvysu:89: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra koṭiśatasahasrāṃgikasya divyasya tūryasya
K10sukhvysu:90: cāryaiḥ(2) saṃpravāditasya valgur manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati evam eva
K10sukhvysu:91: śāriputra tāsāṃ ca tālapaṃktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṃkiṇījālānāṃ
K10sukhvysu:94: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati dharmānusmṛtiḥ kāye
K10sukhvysu:98: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitāyur nāmocyate /
K10sukhvysu:99: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasya teṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇām(3)
K10sukhvysu:102: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasya daśa kalpā anuttarāṃ
K10sukhvysu:104: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitābho
K10sukhvysu:105: nāmocyate / tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasyābhāpratihatā
K10sukhvysu:108: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ
K10sukhvysu:113: punar aparaṃ śāriputra ye 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā
K10sukhvysu:115: teṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇam ākhyātum
K10sukhvysu:124: śāriputra kuśalamūlenāmitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapadyaṃte /
K10sukhvysu:125: yaḥ kaścic chāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya
K10sukhvysu:126: bhagavato 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyati śrutvā ca manasikariṣyati
K10sukhvysu:127: ekarātraṃ vā dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā catūrātraṃ vā
K10sukhvysu:128: paṃcarātraṃ vā ṣaḍrātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ vāvikṣiptacitto manasikariṣyati
K10sukhvysu:129: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati tasya kālaṃ
K10sukhvysu:131: purataḥ sthāsyati so 'viparyastacittaḥ kālaṃ kariṣyati ca(4) /
K10sukhvysu:132: sa kālaṃ krtvā tasyaivāmitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sukhāvatyāṃ
K10sukhvysu:134: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra idam arthavaśam saṃpaśyamāna
K10sukhvysu:135: evaṃ vadāmi satkṛtya kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetre
K10sukhvysu:137: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra aham etarhi tāṃ parikīrtayāmi evam eva
K10sukhvysu:138: śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśy akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato merudhvajo nāma
K10sukhvysu:139: tathāgato mahāmerur nāma tathāgato meruprabhāso nāma tathāgato
K10sukhvysu:140: maṃjudhvajo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi
K10sukhvysu:146: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi caṃdrasūryapradīpo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabho
K10sukhvysu:147: nāma tathāgato mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato merupradīpo nāma
K10sukhvysu:148: tathāgato 'naṃtavīryo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ
K10sukhvysu:152: yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ //12//
K10sukhvysu:153: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśy amitāyur nāma tathāgato 'mitaskaṃdho nāma
K10sukhvysu:154: tathāgato 'mitadhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāprabho nāma tathāgato
K10sukhvysu:155: mahāratnaketur nāma tathāgataḥ śuddharaśmiprabho nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ
K10sukhvysu:162: evam uttarāyāṃ diśi mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato vaiśvānaranirghoṣo
K10sukhvysu:164: duṣpradharṣo nāma tathāgata ādityasaṃbhavo nāma tathāgato jaleniprabho
K10sukhvysu:165: nāma tathāgataḥ prabhākaro nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhā(5)
K10sukhvysu:169: pratīyatha yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma
K10sukhvysu:171: evam adhastāyāṃ diśi siṃho nāma tathāgato yaśo nāma tathāgato
K10sukhvysu:172: yaśaḥprabhāso nāma tathāgato dharmo nama tathāgato dharmadharo
K10sukhvysu:173: nāma tathāgato dharmadhvajo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputrādhastāyāṃ
K10sukhvysu:176: pratīyatha yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma
K10sukhvysu:178: evam upariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi brahmaghoṣo nāma tathāgato nakṣatrarājo
K10sukhvysu:179: nāma tathāgata iṃdraketudhvajarājo nāma tathāgato gaṃdhottamo nama
K10sukhvysu:180: tathāgato gaṃdhaprabhāso nāma tathāgato mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato
K10sukhvysu:182: tathāgato ratnotpalaśrīr nāma tathāgataḥ sarvārthadarśo nāma tathāgataḥ
K10sukhvysu:183: sumerukalpo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputropariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi
K10sukhvysu:188: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho
K10sukhvysu:189: nāmocyate / ye kecic chāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
K10sukhvysu:190: vāsya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyaṃti teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K10sukhvysu:191: nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyaṃti sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā bhaviṣyaṃty avinivartanīyāś
K10sukhvysu:194: śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mākāṃkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ /
K10sukhvysu:195: ye kecic chāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya
K10sukhvysu:197: kṛtaṃ vā kurvaṃti vā sarve te 'vinivartanīyā bhaviṣyaṃty anuttarāyāṃ
K10sukhvysu:198: tatra ca buddhakṣetra upapatsyaṃty upapannā vopapadyaṃti vā /
K10sukhvysu:199: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tatra buddhakṣetre
K10sukhvysu:201: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputrāham etarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām
K10sukhvysu:203: parikīrtayāmi evam eva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā
K10sukhvysu:210: tan mamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yan mayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv
K10sukhvysu:212: deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kalpakaṣāye //19//
K10sukhvysu:215: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragaṃdharvaś ca loko bhagavato
